an4.88:5.1: * Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇamacalo hoti?
an4.88:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
an4.88:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇamacalo hoti.
an4.88:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā, rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
an4.88:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapuṇḍarīko hoti.
an4.88:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an4.88:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapadumo hoti.
an4.88:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti?
an4.88:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an4.88:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an4.88:8.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
